original_text: A certain young man was following Jesus. He was wearing only one piece of linen cloth to cover himself. The men tried to take hold of this young man.
korean_text: 한 청년이 벗은 몸에 베 홑이불을 두르고 예수를 따라가다가 무리에게 잡히매

sentences.original_text: A certain young man was following Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 청년 한 사람이 예수님을 따르고 있었다

sentences.original_text: He was wearing only one piece of linen cloth
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 아마포 한 조각만 걸치고 있었다

sentences.original_text: The men tried to take hold of this young man
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들이 이 청년을 잡으려고 했다
